column4: I have a question. I installed 11.04 and it  has unity. I want to go back to classic ubuntu like in 10.10 on my other computer. But at the login screen I don't have the ubuntu classic option. I installed the gnome one but it's was the right one . I don't know what's the command to install the classic desktop. Does anyone know ? all the tutorial says it should be switchable at the login screen but it's not
is it 11.04 or 11.10 that you installed?
lsb_release -a in a terminal will tell you for sure
definitely 11.10.   I'll look into the gnome-shell package. I tried one but dont recall which
